publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1356.1 Malcolm Chisholm: Community Care-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1356) in the name of Nicola Sturgeon, leave out from "is concerned" to end and insert "notes that the Health and Community Care Committee is conducting an inquiry into Community Care and believes it is appropriate that the Parliament awaits the outcome of the Committee's conclusions." Supported by: Susan Deacon*
